design.philosophy: Minimalist, Steve Jobs-inspired. Focus, Deference, Depth.

styles.inlineStyles: Use className with CSS variables. Only positional inline styles allowed for AeroTimeline overlays.
styles.colors: All colors must use var(--token-name) from tokens.css. No hex codes in components.

accessibility.focusVisible: All interactive elements must have focus-visible styles using var(--focus).
accessibility.keyboard: All interactions must be keyboard accessible.
accessibility.ariaLabels: Provide meaningful aria-labels for icons and controls.
accessibility.contrast: ≥ 4.5:1 for text. Do not encode state by color alone.

testing.unit: vitest for date utilities and business logic
